meta.title: The most flexible lift bed for motorhomes and vans | VAN7
meta.description: Discover the lift bed with the highest comfort and optimal space utilization for campers, transporters, motorhomes, or trailers. Never sleep unevenly again and make the best use of the space.

hero.h1:
The lift bed

with the highest comfort

& the best space utilization
hero.context:
Set the perfect height and make the most of your space.

Level out and enjoy sleeping comfort like at home - no matter how uneven your van is.

benefits.noMovement: Stably fixed, no swinging or rocking
benefits.enoughSpace: Enough space for equipment, bikes, furniture

setHeight.title: Adjust height continuously
setHeight.text: You no longer have to choose between comfort or space - you get both. Thanks to the stepless height adjustment, you can easily set the bed to your desired height with the crank. Whether you drive a motorhome or a van, you can optimally use the storage space for bicycles, motorcycles, or other equipment and still sleep in the highest comfort.

levelOut.title: Level out
levelOut.text: No matter how uneven the terrain is - the Van7 lift bed adapts to your needs. With the flexible strap fixation, you can level the bed individually at all four corners, so you always sleep in a comfortable, horizontal position. Whether in a motorhome at the campsite or with your van in the wilderness - choose your sleeping place freely and enjoy restful nights wherever you park.

fix.title: Fix to the wall
fix.text: Unlike conventional solutions, our lift bed comes completely without annoying guide rails. With our patented fixation function, the bed is firmly pulled to the side wall, so it neither wobbles nor sways.

extend.title: Extend slatted frame
extend.text: Space for three people? No problem. Use the entire width of the vehicle with the optional extension to a maximum width of 190 cm.

reviews.title: The most popular lift bed among

reviews.Customer: I spent a few nights in this bed and loved it, very comfortable and cozy. Aligning and fixing the fold-down bed is child's play. All in all a very good investment.
reviews.Stefan: Absolutely brilliant product! Not only does this make the interior of the vehicle much more flexible and multifunctional, the technical details and quality are also outstanding. By the way, the team behind Van7 is also very committed and helpful. 6 stars
reviews.Andreas: Simply great if you want to install a bed in your bus or van. This gives us maximum space to store the mountain bikes or motorcycle and by leveling the bed incl. The fixation function means you always have a horizontal position when sleeping and can start again the next day. I can only recommend it to everyone. üëç üöê
reviews.Lorenz: I am super happy with my bed!! Finally having more space in the car makes things a lot easier for me when camping, I can only recommend the Van7 bed!!
reviews.Jean-Marc: Super intelligent filing system, very good workmanship, and competent/friendly contact person! It's a pleasure!

optimized.title: Tested and optimized
optimized.text: The Van7 lift bed is the result of years of development and optimization. Through careful tests and continuous improvements over various series, numerous challenges have been solved, such as the durability of the gears, the efficiency of the winches, and the prevention of wear.

partner.title: Find installation partner
partner.text: Worry-free installation by our installation partners. Quick and reliable, so you can fully focus on your adventure.

diy.title: DIY instructions
diy.text: For many, the adventure begins before the first road trip. Our videos show you how to easily and quickly install the bed yourself.

contact.StefanWillHelp: Stefan will be happy to help you.

meta.title: Buy lift beds for every situation & installation location | VAN7 Shop
meta.description: Discover lift beds for every installation situation: king size, cross sleeper, longitudinal lift bed, cockpit or bunk lift bed. Space-saving, stable & comfortable - for the highest sleeping comfort on the go. Find the perfect lift bed now!

kingsize-hubbett-mit-lattenrostauszug.name: Kingsize Lift Bed
kingsize-hubbett-mit-lattenrostauszug.title: VAN7 Kingsize Lift Bed with Slatted Frame Extension
kingsize-hubbett-mit-lattenrostauszug.description: Create a huge sleeping oasis in your vehicle with a length of 200cm x 160cm max. 190cm width - The slatted frame can be extended to a maximum of 190cm. Even with three people, sleeping is comfortable with this bed size.

laengs-hubbett.name: Lengthwise Lift Bed
laengs-hubbett.title: VAN7 Lengthwise Lift Bed
laengs-hubbett.description: Create a sleeping oasis in your vehicle with a length of 200cm and width of 140 or 160 cm.

cockpit-hubbett.name: Cockpit Lift Bed
cockpit-hubbett.title: VAN7 Cockpit Lift Bed with Slatted Frame Extension
cockpit-hubbett.description: For campers who want to save even more space and weight. The cockpit lift bed is a real innovation that makes new conversion concepts possible. Compact 140x110cm or 160x110cm under the ceiling with an extension to 200cm length. After stepless lowering, leveling - so you always sleep horizontally, no matter how uneven the vehicle is, and the fixation function, the integrated slatted frame is extended to a maximum of 200cm - e.g., into the driver's cab to make use of the space there. The extension is secured with a 25mm strap.

querschlaefer-hubbett.name: Cross Sleeper Lift Bed
querschlaefer-hubbett.title: VAN7 Cross Sleeper Lift Bed with Slatted Frame Extension
querschlaefer-hubbett.description: For campers who want to save even more space and weight. The cross lift bed is a real innovation. Compact 140x140cm (160x160) under the ceiling with an extension to 200cm length. After stepless lowering, leveling - so you always sleep horizontally, no matter how uneven the vehicle is, and the fixation function, the integrated slatted frame is extended to a maximum of 200cm - With flares (wall extensions) on one side, you get at least 190cm width (length of the extension).

stock-hubbett.name: Bunk Lift Bed
stock-hubbett.title: VAN7 Bunk Lift Bed for up to 5 people

fahrradhalter.title: VAN7 Bicycle holder
fahrradhalter.description: Do you want to transport your bikes safely in the vehicle in the future and don't feel like dealing with large, cumbersome constructions? Then the Van7 bicycle holder is just right for you! Want to learn more about the Van7 bicycle holder? Then check out our YouTube video.

product.sizeGuide: The possible size of the VAN7 lift bed for your vehicle depends on the ceiling width. We are happy to advise you by phone or WhatsApp.
product.mountingNote: The following vehicles do not require mounting brackets: Mercedes Sprinter H2-H3 2006-present, VW Crafter 2006-2016, Opel Movano, Renault Master, Ford Custom.

comfortable.title: Unique Camping Comfort
comfortable.text: What our customers love the most is the unique leveling function, which allows you to bring the bed into a horizontal position with one pull, even on the most uneven campsite, and thus rest as comfortably as at home.

fixed.title: Patented Fixation Function
fixed.text: Only with this function is it possible to stably fix a free-floating lift bed to your desired height and inclination on the side - so that the bed does NOT rock!

mechanic.title: Without Electricity and Guide Rails
mechanic.text: For many campers, weight and functionality in a small space are very important. The crank mechanism is faster and 17kg lighter than an electric motor. The VAN7 lift bed always works, and thanks to our fixation function, it does so without storage constructions and rails that greatly affect the space and create noise during the ride.

extendable.title: Maximum Lying Surface
extendable.text: The 140cm wide bed contains a 190cm wide lying surface. The first lift bed in the world with a slatted frame extension. This allows you to extend the lying surface to the maximum width of your vehicle after lowering.

noiseFree.title: Off-road Driving Without Rattling Noises
noiseFree.text: We made sure during the construction that the bed does not create any noise during the ride, so you can enjoy the ride.

easyInstallation.title: Easy Installation
easyInstallation.text: If you can handle a cordless screwdriver and a tape measure or know someone who can, the installation of the new series with the supplied video instructions is child's play. Of course, we also have installation partners who can take over the installation of the lift bed. Depending on the vehicle, there are suitable mounting brackets. Some vehicles, like the H2 Sprinter, do not need mounting brackets.

romantic.title: Practical and Romantic
romantic.text: The indirect, dimmable lighting according to your mood creates a pleasant ambiance above and below the bed. The LED strip is neatly integrated into the aluminum profiles.

safety.title: Secure Belt Attachment
safety.text: The VAN7 lift bed hangs on 4x 25mm safety belts and buckles, each rated for 400daN. That means 1600kg - the load capacity of the bed is dynamically permissible with 270kg. Each belt suspension is attached with 2x M6 rivet nuts. A M6 rivet nut holds 4-5kN under shear in a vehicle sheet metal - that's 400-500kg per rivet nut. For the VAN7 lift bed belt suspensions, 8 rivet nuts are installed in the last area of the wall of your vehicle.

space.title: Maximum Space
space.text: The VAN7 lift bed offers you the space and comfort you need when staying overnight in a small mobile space. In no time, it disappears at the ceiling, and you have a lot of storage space for bikes or an additional seating area.

footer.description: The lift bed for every (parking) situation! Sleep horizontally and still have enough storage space in the camper? With VAN7 you don't have to compromise!
